Package it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Cards.PublicObjectiveCard

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PublicEffects
    Interface PublicEffects(DP Strategy): the interface used for declare method to calculate the points. that will be re-implementd by every card that have an effect
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorVariety
    Class ColorVariety: it represents the public card Color Variety of the game and its effect
    ColumnColorVariety
    Class ColumnColorVariety: it represents the public card Column Color Variety of the game and its effect
    ColumnShadeVariety
    Class ColumnShadeVariety: it represents the public card Column Shade Variety of the game and its effect
    DeepShades
    Class DeepShades: it represents the public card Deep Shades of the game and its effect
    DiagonalColor
    Class DiagonalColor: it represents the public card Diagonal Color of the game and its effect
    LightShades
    Class LightShades: it represents the public card Light Shades of the game and its effect
    MediumShades
    Class MediumShades: it represents the public card Medium Shades of the game and its effect
    PublicObjectiveCard
    Class PublicObjectiveCard: it represents a Public Objective Card of the game, it's implemented by using the DP Strategy to let the other classes decide which algorithms to set to the specified Public Card
    RowColorVariety
    Class RowColorVarietyw: it represents the public card Row Color Variety of the game and its effect
    RowShadeVariety
    Class RowShadeVariety: it represents the public card Row Shade Variety of the game and its effect
    ShadeVariety
    Class ShadeVariety: it represents the public card Shade Variety of the game and its effect
